title: "MHA seeks startups for voice recognition tech to curb cyber frauds"
excerpt: "The Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) is looking for a voice recognition system (VRS) to tackle cyber frauds conducted via phone calls. It has invited applications for the same under the Defence India Start-up Challenge."
